ComicInfo.Summary: The Mirror War [Part 8]: Drunk with power, Picard puts the entire fleet in jeopardy by planning to launch a suicidal attack on Cardassia Prime, forcing Riker to assassinate Picard and assume the captaincy. Riker diverts the fleet to eliminate the Klingon fleet and forces a cease-fire with the Cardassians. Then Riker sends Shelby to the Imperial Palace to kill Emperor Quinn, and Riker becomes the new emperor of the Terran Empire.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 13:36:55. [CVDB942890] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:00:17. [Issue ID 2425826]
